metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8754 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** The libevt_record_values_read_event() function in libevt_record_values.c in libevt before 2018-03-17 does not properly check for out-of-bounds values of user SID data size, strings size, or data size. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described in libyal/libevt issue 5 on GitHub.

criterions.comment: libevt package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20170120-2').
